Load profile¶

Option 1: Read from file (OPERATIONAL)¶

Option 2: Estimated with demandlib (CURRENTLY NOT OPERATIONAL)¶

The demand profile estimation is based on the number and annual consumption of households and businesses at the project site. In the future, the interactive addition of further sectors could be interesting.

Currently, the script calculates the profile for each sector in 15-min, 1-hr and 1-d timesteps. Additionaly, the total consumption and the highest peak of a day are summarized. Plots for all cases are displayed, as well as other summarized values. The energy system recieves the total consumption as the project demand profile.
